attributes.action: Remove Russian embassy staff and convert building to benefit Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
Ukraine and its citizens deserve better support and Russia should be made an outcast in every other country.

Diplomatic channels have clearly closed and Russian has even imposed restrictions on UK politicians, yet we continue to pander to their politicians and oligarchs.
attributes.background: Remove current Russian embassy (London) occupants and convert the building to benefit Ukraine, either as a) an upgraded embassy for Ukraine or b) a humanitarian centre for housing and providing support to Ukrainian refugees.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the Russian embassy are a matter for the Russian diplomatic service, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Sever diplomatic relations with the Russian Federation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610043
